alert.note: Alert for Brown; Shawano; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 7:09AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BROWN...SOUTHERN OCONTO AND EASTERN SHAWANO COUNTIES THROUGH 745 AM CDT... At 708 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pulaski, or 17 miles southeast of Shawano, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Pulaski, Little Suamico, Chase, Oconto Falls, Pittsfield, Abrams, Angelica, Stiles, Bonduel, and Morgan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to ponding of water on roads. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
